document_data.name: Rising Moon
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Rising Moon''' was an inn found in [[Highmoon]], [[Deepingdale]], during late 14{{Th}} century [[DR]]. It offered modest accommodations and rooms for travelers on a budget, such as [[merchant]]s, [[adventurer]]s, and [[mercenaries]].

A room at the Rising Moon inn cost 6 [[sp]] per night.
